reference_summary:
Growom Garden Hose Nozzle 4 Adjustable Spray Patterns Garden Sprayer Heavy Duty Metal Hose Nozzle with 3 Washers for Gardening, Car Washing, Pet Bathing and General Cleaning
Growom
{'Brand': 'Growom', 'Finish Type': 'Polished', 'Material': 'Heavy,Metal', 'Handle Type': 'Lever', 'Package Dimensions': '8.3 x 4.6 x 1.7 inches; 1.15 Pounds'}
This nozzle is super built to last. It’s rather heavy but I know it will withstand the much abuse. My only worry is we have hard water and sometimes that eats away at our nozzles over time. Great product that will last though!
Super heavy duty
The Beachwaver Co. Dual Voltage, S1, White
{'Product Benefits': 'This ceramic, rotating curling iron provides easy, quality waves in minutes!', 'Shape': 'Barrel', 'Brand': 'The Beachwaver Co.', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Product Dimensions': '15.75 x 1.75 x 2 inches; 14.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '817741020613', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/SB10T', 'Country of Origin': 'China'}
First off, I know it pricey for a curling iron but it actually does the trick and is pretty cool. You clip your hair in the bottom little clipper and I prefer the low speed and it winds your hair for you up the wand! It gets nice and hot and curls did stay well after hrs or wear in semi humid weather. Definitely takes a little getting use to but it’s pretty cool. You do need to take slightly smaller sections of hair to curl so the clipper can hold it but I really enjoyed using this!
I was skeptical but this is super amazing
JPNK 4PCS Anti-Static Detangling Fine & Wide Tooth Shower Comb Set
JPNK
{'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'JPNK', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy,Straight', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '12 x 3.1 x 0.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces'}
I love these combs not only for myself but for my daughters hair. They are perfect for any hair length or texture as you have a set of 4 from wide tooth to fine tooth. They feel nice on the scalp and glide through hair easily. These are a great deal for 4 of these!
Great detangler combs
Magnesium Serum For Kids - All Natural Rub for Kids and Babies, Toxic Free + Free Magnesium Chart PDF
Raise Them Well
{'Brand': 'Raise Them Well', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Unit Count': '2 Fl. Oz', 'Flavor': 'Unflavored', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.41 x 1.5 x 1.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '853647007044', 'Manufacturer': 'Raise Them Well'}
Unfortunately I didn't notice much different with this spray. I think it smells nice and it a great idea to calm kiddos but I fine essential oil rollers on the bottom of the feet to have more contact with the skin making them more effective.
Didn't notice any difference
Pick & Pick (Gentle/metal allergy free material)
MIND UP
{'Package Dimensions': '7 x 1.2 x 0.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces'}
I was hopeful for this pick but disappointed. First off, it's a super flimsy and you can't use much pressure when pressing against teeth. Also, the pointed end that is supposed to clear put any food from between the teeth isn't pointed enough so you can't really get in there all the way. Last, because you cannot put enough pressure to scrape off gunk, it becomes useless.
Way to flimsy
6 Pack Soft Headband BEoffer Coral Fleece Women Makeup Spa Head Bands Turban Fashion Bow Bowknot Hairlace Headwear Wash Face Hair Holder Elastic Top Knot Bandage Girl Baby Hair Accessories 6 Colors
BEoffer
{'Age Range (Description)': 'Baby', 'Material': 'Elastic', 'Fabric Type': 'Fleece', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Face Makeup', 'Product Dimensions': '7.28 x 1.97 x 0.67 inches; 1.16 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BH-002', 'UPC': '799899729252'}
These super cute headbands are perfect for washing you face at the end of the night, making sure all the hair stays out for your face, and when I am applying my sunscreen in the morning so it doesn't get in my hair. They are super soft and come in a variety of colors!!!
Perfect for washing face
Hairdresser Scissors Set Hair Thinning Scissors Hairdressing Shears Set with Wipe Cloth,Grinding card, Hair Razor Comb, Clips, Upgraded Professional Haircut Set black
Lyeiaa
['All-in-One Hair Cutting Kit :1 x Hair Scissor,1 x Grinding card,1 x Hair Razor Comb, 1 x Cleaning Cloth, 1 x Comb, 2 x Hairpin clips , 1 x Neck Duster. The hair cutting kit meets all your hair cutting and styling needs.']
{'Brand': 'Lyeiaa', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.94 x 4.09 x 1.54 inches; 12.73 Ounces', 'UPC': '303276761980', 'Manufacturer': 'Lyeiaa'}
This kit is my favorite one I've purchased. I cut my kids and husband's hair and this is everything you will need! Comes in a nifty little case that holds it all together. The cape is perfect for minimizing hairs everywhere. The scissors and thinning sheers are super sharp and use with minimal effort. So far this is the best kit I am using and would recommend to anyone.
All in one kit
Winky Lux Double Matte Whip 24-Hour Waterproof Lipstick, Liquid Wet Lipstick for Long-Lasting Matte Lip Color, Hydrating Makeup with Vanilla and Avocado Oil to Lock in Moisture, 0.14 Oz, Cookie
Winky Lux
{'Brand': 'Winky Lux', 'Color': 'Cookie', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.65 x 0.65 x 4.28 inches; 0.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '859346006968'}
This pretty color goes on wet and dries down to a very pretty medium brown. I have light olive skin and found it very complementary to my skintone. Not too dark that it's a nighttime look but dark enough that it looks like I'm wearing something. Stays on pretty well and I will definitely be buying more
Pretty neutral shade
Magnetic Eyelashes and Magnetic Eyeliner Kit, Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner, 5 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelashes with Tweezer, False Lashes
Eyenjoy
{'Brand': 'Eyenjoy', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.71 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Magnet', 'Product Dimensions': '5.71 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '736067423758'}
I had to keep reapplying the magnetic eyeliner especially in the corners of my eyes where it maybe got wet from blinking. I didn't feel like I could go out without the eyeliner in my purse to reapply everything I had a mirror. To me that just too much work then and you might as well use regular lashes.
Don't stay well
Aloe Vera Gel 100% Natural Moisturisers - Pure Organic Fresh Soothing Aloe-Vera Moisturizing Gel Skin Hair, Aloe Leaf Wash-free Clean After Sun Face Body (8.8 oz)
CIMIY
{'Brand': 'CIMIY', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Unit Count': '8.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 11.22 Ounces'}
We use aloe a lot in our house as my daughter is constantly scraping her knees. This aloe has a nice push too for easy use and it a pretty decent value size. No strong smell and dries fast. Great buy.
Nice bottle for easy use
Bloomy Essentials Organic Tea Tree Essential Oil 10 mL - USDA Certified Organic - Hair, Skin, Toenail Fungus, and Acne - 100% Pure
Bloomy Essentials
{'Brand': 'Bloomy Essentials', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Special Feature': 'Pure', 'Seasons': 'All Seasons', 'Item Volume': '10 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 0.75 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '680912084581', 'Manufacturer': 'Bloomy Essentials'}
Fairly good sized bottle and price. Oil consistency was pretty good snd I found the scent to be right on. Smells great!
Smells great
Sdara Aloe Vera Gel For Face and Body - Organic & Natural, Soothing & Cooling For Sunburn Relief, Restorative For Dry Skin - Made In USA
Sdara Skincare
{'Brand': 'Sdara Skincare', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.9 x 2.3 x 1.3 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '707486993085'}
I like this aloe because it speaks easily and absorbs into the skin quickly. Its so hard to keep still letting it fully dry but this one doesn't take long at all. I like the lack for a strong scent and natural ingredients.
Spreads easily
2oz / 60ml Glass Spray Bottles for DIY Refill, Essential Oils, Pillow Mists,Fine Mist Spray -3Packs Amber Color
EagleKing
{'Brand': 'EagleKing', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '2 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 6.1 x 1.7 inches; 8.78 Ounces'}
I used these bottles to make my own essential oil room sprays for the bathroom. They are the perfect smaller size to fit on the back of the toilet and last forever as you only need one or two sprays. Sprayer lasts well in addition to the pump. Amber color is perfect for keeping essential oils good for a long time! Great purchase!
DIY essential oil spray

Aloe Hand Sanitizer 24 Pack Dearskin Aloe Vera Moisturizing Alcohol 75% Gel 2 Fl Oz/60ml Skin Care Natural Advanced Formula Alcohol Refreshing Moisturizing with Argine.
Dearskin
['24 Pack Dearskin Hand Sanitizer 60ml, 2 Fl Oz', 'Dearskin Hand sanitizer Kills 99.9% of the most common germs!', '- Clean and Refreshing Moisturizing;', '- Long-Lasting Antibacterial;', '- Easy to use, hard to waste; -', '75% Alcohol;', 'Drug Facts: Active ingredients: - Alcohol 75% v/v. Antiseptic. Use: Hand sanitizer to help reduce bacteria that potentially can cause disease. For use when soap and water are not available. For external use only. Flammable. Keep away from or flame. Do not use: - In children less than 2 months of age. - On open skin wounds. When using this product keep out of eyes, and mouth. In case of contact with eyes, rinse eyes thoroughly with water. Stop use and ask a doctor if irritation or rash occurs. These may be sings of a serious condition. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away. Directions: - Place enough product on hands to cover all surfaces. Rub hands together until dry. - Supervise children under 6 years of age when use this product to avoid swallowing. Other information: Store between 15-30C (59-86F). Avoid freezing and excessive heat above 40C (104F). Inactive ingredients: Deionized Water, Aloe Barbadensis Extract, Carbomer, Arginine. Distributed by: Dearskin LLC, FL.']
{'Brand': 'Dearskin', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '24', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals, Travel Size, Moisturizer', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 4 x 4 inches; 2.36 Ounces', 'UPC': '850005863359', 'Manufacturer': 'Dearskin'}
This hand sanitizer works great. It isn't too sticky and a little goes a long way. Great value for the price. So easy to use and love the high alcohol continent to keep germs away for myself and my family! Perfect for each family member to keep in their pocket!
Love these little bottles

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: The user continues to prioritize heavy-duty gardening tools and beauty products, with a strong affinity for essential oils and DIY applications. Their holistic approach to personal care is enhanced by seeking products that combine natural ingredients and vibrant aesthetics.

- **Material Preference**: A reinforced emphasis on metal for gardening tools and glass for beauty products reflects the user’s commitment to preserving the quality of natural formulations.

- **Concern for Durability and Aesthetics**: While the user values durability, they have also integrated an appreciation for design aesthetics and sensory experiences. They prefer multifunctional products that excel in various applications, increasing overall practicality.

- **Versatility**: There is a noticeable trend in their search for multifunctional items in both gardening and beauty, which indicates a desire for efficiency in their modern lifestyle.

- **Overall Satisfaction**: The user shows high satisfaction with their purchases, particularly highlighting product effectiveness. They consistently prioritize performance and value in their selections.

- **Review Behavior**: Their recent review behavior reflects thoughtful engagement, celebrating usability, color vibrancy, and longevity, which showcases their analytical and appreciative approach. The latest review emphasizes successful DIY applications for personal beauty, reinforcing their holistic and hands-on engagement with beauty products.

Overall, the user exemplifies a dedication to functionality, quality, and a thoughtful selection process that aligns with their holistic lifestyle choices.
